issue.message: Uses Thread.sleep()
Unnecessary; `Build.VERSION.SDK_INT < VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP` is never true here
This folder configuration (`v21`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 21. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
This folder configuration (`v21`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 21. Merge all the resources in this folder into `values`.
This getter should be public such that `onBindEditTextListener` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
This getter should be public such that `valueIndex` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
This getter should be public such that `valueIndex` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
